body.p: At the end of Year 1, the market interest rate falls from 10 per cent a year to 5 per cent a year. Consequently, the entity revises its expectations about future cash flows as follows:

li.p: it expects to achieve a return of 5 per cent in Year 3 (instead of 10 per cent) after reinvesting the maturity proceeds of the fixed income securities that mature at the end of Year 2;
the fixed income securities it expects to acquire at the end of Year 2 will generate CU1,906 at the end of Year 3; and
it will pay policyholders CU1,802 at the end of Year 3 (94.54% × CU1,906).
